dbProcs
Class Database

java.lang.Object
  dbProcs.Database

public class Database
extends java.lang.Object

Used to create database connections using the FileInputProperties.readfile method to gather property information Initiated by Getter.java, Setter.java

getConnection

public static java.sql.Connection getConnection(java.lang.String ApplicationRoot)

getSqlInjLessonConnection

This method is used by the application to get a connection to the secure database sever's SQL injection Lesson schema

Returns:
A connection to the secure database server

getChallengeConnection

public static java.sql.Connection getChallengeConnection(java.lang.String ApplicationRoot,
                                                         java.lang.String path)
This method is used by the application to get a connection to the secure database sever based on the inputted path to a specific properties file.

Parameters:
ApplicationRoot - The running context of the application.
path - The path to the properties file to use for this connection. this is filtered for path traversal attacks
Returns:
A connection to the secure database server

closeConnection

public static void closeConnection(java.sql.Connection conn)
Closes an open database connection

Parameters:
conn - Connection to vulnerable database
